message: Let's be reasonable and split the money. I take a bit more as I lose money to inflation with each round.
My turn.  This split accounts for the time pressure on you.
I need a better offer to account for the inflation. This is a fair split.
Time is running out, and the value is diminishing for both of us. This is a fair offer considering the circumstances.
